item.title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Is the Biggest New Third-Party Game Launch on Xbox Game Pass of 2025
item.description:
The turn-based RPG Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 has taken the gaming world by storm, shattering records for day-one Game Pass launches in 2025. Developed by a small indie team, the game features stunning visuals and a unique “reactive turn-based” combat system.

Why It’s A Hit

  1. Visual Style: Using Unreal Engine 5 to its fullest.
  2. Story: A deep, emotional narrative about a cursed expedition.
  3. Music: Orchestral score that rivals Triple-A productions.

“We never expected this level of reception,” said the studio head. “It’s a dream come true.”
